articles.author: Emily Peck
articles.title: Inside Corporate America, transgender bathroom use is already settled - Axios
articles.description: Congress is embroiled in a workplace fight that is outside the norm in the private sector.
articles.content:
Congress is embroiled in what's essentially a workplace fight over bathrooms that is pretty outside the norm in the private sector.
Why it matters: Most private companies have made efforts over the … [+2598 chars]
